d: Shelly is a raglan shirt, perfect for swimshirts and rashguards

hemWidth.d: Sets the hem allowance along the bottom of the body of the shirt, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

sleeveHem.d: Sets the hem allowance of the hem along the end of the sleeves, as a multiple of the seam allowance.

chestEase.d: Controls how wide the shirt will be at your chest.

neckBalance.d: Controls where the neck hole is placed on the shirt.

neckEase.d: Controls how large the neck hole is.

neckbandLength.d: Controls how long the neckband is, as a percentage of the circumference of the neckline.

neckbandWidth.d: Controls how wide the finished neckband will be, as a percentage of the neckline circumference.

sleeveEase.d: Affects how wide the sleeve is at the armhole on all shirts, and has some affect on the width at the hem of short sleeved shirts.

wristEase.d: Affects how wide the end of the sleeve is on sleeves that extend past the biceps. The effect is greater on longer sleeves.

bodyLength.d: Controls how long the shirt is.

sleeveLength.d: Controls the how long the sleeves of your shirt will be.

hipsEase.d: Controls how wide your shirt will be at the bottom hem. This option is only used if the straight sides option is disabled.

raglanScoopLength.d: Controls how far out from the armhole the raglan seam starts to scoop.

raglanScoopMagnitude.d: Controls how much extra material to place under the armpits.

sideShape.d: Controls how the side seam is curved. This option is ignored if the straight sides option is enabled.

straightSides.d: Forms a tubular shirt, which is a shirt where the hips and chest are the same width and connected by a straight seam.
